system.description:
Your artifact is cursed, and while you have learned to cope with it, you have not managed to suppress its effects entirely. When you select this archetype, select one of the following options:

  • Unmoored: You permanently suffer the Bewildered mental stress effect.
  • Paranoid: You permanently suffer the On Edge mental stress effect.
  • Troubled: You permanently suffer the Sleepless mental stress effect.
  • Fettered: Your movement speeds are reduced by 10 feet.
  • Gravebound: When a critical hit is scored against you, make a DC 15 Constitution save. On a failed save, you immediately drop to 0 hit points.

Your artifact affliction is an inherent part of your bond with your bonded artifact and is unaffected by spells such as @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.l16wg9h1z9s16exb]{Remove Curse},@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.hms9kdl2qoqjjrs4]{Dispel Magic}, and even @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pe52jryde7ljobzq]{Wish}.

effects.name: On Edge
effects.description: A creature that is on edge is hyperaware of its surroundings and unable to fully relax. An on edge creature has advantage on Perception and initiative checks, but disadvantage on all other ability checks as it is distracted, unable to take its mind off the dangers that could potentially lurk around every corner.
